system.description: When you make a check using a lore skill to recall information about a creature that is of a type you could detect with your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense}, you are always treated as proficient with a relevant skill. If you are already proficient with a skill that could be used to discover or learn information about the creature, you gain advantage on the check instead.
